amendment.description: An amendment numbered 226 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds for future defense projects that do not conform with military resilience standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A077) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A077) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A077) Agreed to by voice vote.
